BusinessProcessGroup.name: BusinessProcessGroup
BusinessProcessGroup.description: Setup object that stores information about customer lifecycle maps. Customer lifecycle maps are used to track the scores provided by customers across their lifecycle using Salesforce Surveys.

CustomerSatisfactionMetric.description: Represents the question type that measures the customers' Net Promote Score or satisfaction score across their lifecycle.

Description.description: Description of the customer lifecycle map.

DeveloperName.description: Developer name the customer lifecycle map.

MasterLabel.description: Label of the customer lifecycle map.
